name: PHILADELPHIA New York Cheesecake III
author: Philadelphia
summary: Classics never go out of style - this rich and creamy cheesecake is, as always, irresistible.
ingredients: 1 ¼ cups HONEY MAID Graham Cracker Crumbs
5 (250 g) packages PHILADELPHIA Brick Cream Cheese, softened
directions: Heat oven to 325 degrees F if using a silver 9 inch springform pan (or to 300 degrees F if using a dark nonstick 9-inch springform pan)
Mix crumbs and butter; press firmly onto bottom of pan
Beat cream cheese, sugar, flour and vanilla in large bowl with electric mixer on medium speed until well blended
Add eggs, one at a time, mixing on low speed after each addition just until blended
Bake 1 hour 10 minutes or until centre is almost set
Run knife or metal spatula around rim of pan to loosen cake; cool before removing rim of pan
Top with pie filling before serving
